net.proteusframework.core.automation

Class ValidationStatement

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.automation.SQLStatement
      • net.proteusframework.core.automation.ValidationStatement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Loggable

    public class ValidationStatement
extends SQLStatement
    Validation SQL. This can be used for simple tests that are used to determine if the results of a query match expectations.

    Limitations: the query must expect to receive an empty result set or a result set with a single column and a single row.

    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)

      • validate

        @Nullable
public String validate(ResultSet result)
                throws SQLException
        Validate the result. The ResultSet will be reset to the beginning.
        Parameters:
        result - the result from running the SQL.
        Returns:
        the message on failure. Null on success.
        Throws:
        SQLException - on error.
